original_text: But we are truly God's people. And it is not because someone has circumcised us. It is God's own Spirit that leads us to worship God. We thank God because of what Christ Jesus has done for us. We know that it is not human ideas that can save us.
korean_text: 하나님의 성령으로 봉사하며 그리스도 예수로 자랑하고 육체를 신뢰하지 아니하는 우리가 곧 할례파라

sentences.original_text: But we are truly God's people.
And it is not because someone has circumcised us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 누군가가 우리를 할례했다고 해서 그런 것은 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: It is God's own Spirit that leads us
because of what Christ Jesus has done for us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 예수께서 우리를 위해 하신 일 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: it is not human ideas that can save us.
sentences.korean_translation: 인간의 생각이 우리를 구원할 수는 없다는 것을.
